## What does independence mean?

-   P[Bad outcome | Treated] = P[Bad outcome] or
-   P[Bad outcome | Placebo] = P[Bad outcome] or
-   P[Good outcome | Treated] = P[Good outcome] or
-   P[Good outcome | Placebo] = P[Good outcome]
